title: Rab and His Friends and Other Papers
author: Brown, John
snippet: When driving about Biggar, or in the neighbourhood of Langrig, he was full of the past, showing how keenly, with all his outward reserve, he had observed and felt.

title: Rab and His Friends and Other Papers
author: Brown, John
snippet: He had come home during the vacation of his school to Langrig, and was about to go back; he had been renewing his intercourse with his old teacher and friend whom you mention, from whom he used to say he learned to like Shakspere, and who seems to have been a man of genuine literary tastes.
